about_free:
Lolusizo luzibandakanya, lungathandi nangokweqiniso, lungagunyazi.
Sebenzisa ngezinselelo zakho.
about_data_protection:
Le softhiwe ivikela idatha yakho nobumfihlo ngamakhono ayo onke.
Lolu hlelo lokusebenza lugcina yonke idatha edingekayo endaweni kudivayisi yakho.
Awekho ama-analytics noma isofthiwe yokukhangisa ngaphakathi.
about_data_declaration: Buka i-Privacy and Data Protection Declaration
about_foundation:
Loluhlelo lufinyelelelwa yifayela we-peercoin Foundation.
Sicela uthathe inzuzo emshayeleni wale Foundation, ukuze uqhubeke nokwakhiwa kweleli solwazi.
about_help_or_feedback: Kudingeka usizo noma uthumele utshele umthemba?
about_translate: Ungakusiza ukubhadala lolusizo ezilimi zika-Peercoin Weblate.
about_illustrations: Izithombe zokucacisa zinceda ngenkathi zifanelekile, zingathunyelwa ngezimpendulo
addressbook_dialog_addr_unwatch_unable:
$address
ayikhethi ukubonakala
(kunezekuhlukene kwe-balance noma kukuphela kwalesi sihloko se-balance)
addressbook_export_dialog_description:
Leli key inikeza ukuqeqeshwa okusha kwemali ezimekile nesabelo lesi sicelo.
Ungafanele ukukhongela le key nomuntu!
Hamba phambili kuphela uma uqinisekile ukuthi ukwazi okubalulekile.
app_settings_default_description: I-wallet entsha izofungula uma esho ngokuqala isitayela.
app_settings_description:
Loluhlobo lwemibhalo linolwazi oluzenzekelayo.
Kunemiphumela engcolile, abe nesiqinisekiso ngezinselelo zenkulumo ezithandekayo.
app_settings_notifications_alert_content:
Lokhu kuzovumela izaziso zethu ezivela ngaphandle kwesi-phumela somthelela ezintandokazi.
Zingaphazamisiwe ngesikhathi.
app_settings_notifications_hint_sync_1:
Isiza isikhathi ezifunda izimbalenhle ezintandokazi kusukela ngaphandle.
Isikhathi sezenzakalo: $minutes iminithi.
app_settings_notifications_hint_sync_2: Izaziso zingalula ngezinye izikhathi, kuyabonakala kusukela ngokuthi ungenza kanjani noma kungashintshisi yonke imikhiqizo yesistimu sokusebenza. Abanikezeli bemikhiqizo yamadivayisi ase-iOS kuyafana.
app_settings_price_alert_content:
Lokhu kuzovumela amathuluzi ethu angaphandle omunye umuntu.
Zingaphazamisiwe ngesikhathi.
authenticate_retry_warning_text: I-sitayela izokhanda ngokusebenza kube yilolu hlangothi olukhokhwayo noma kuphele.
buy_peercoin_dialog_content: Abaphandisi lesitayela ayahulumeni ngalolu hlobo lwesithonjana.
import_wif_error_failed_parse: I-key yakho yoku-thenga ayivamile. Nguyikhokhwa ku-format ye-WIF?
import_wif_hint: I-key kudingeka luhlaziswe futhi uma ususa i-wallet nge-seed. Luyahlanganyela noluhlu lokususa.
import_wif_intro:
Sicela uthole i-key yoku-thenga oyifunayo.
Kudingekile kube nge-format ye-WIF.
logout_content:
Uyabona uzofika ukusha phuma?
Kudingeka ufake i-seed yakho ukuze ushintshise ukuhamba kwakho futhi.
paperwallet_error_1:
Isikhwama semali asinalutho 
noma inani elingaphansi kokukhiphayo okuncane
paperwallet_success:
I-Paper Wallet yehlulekileyo. 
Isitayela sizokhombisa kahle esikhathini eside.
periodic_reminder_donate_body:
Loluhlelo luyakwakhiwa nguPeercoin Foundation.
Sicela ulondoloze ukukhombisa kwenkampani yePeercoin kunomunye umthelela.
periodic_reminder_backup_body: Lungisa ikheli le-seed lakho ekhaya njengezinto ezilandelayo ukungakhohlisi ukuphuma kwezindlela zakho.
receive_website_description: Ungathenga i-Peercoin ngokulandeleka ngekhadi lesikredithi (izikhadi ezilula kakhulu ezizimele amakristu kuphela) noma ezinye izenza ezibekhona ezithengiswayo nezisevisi.
receive_website_faucet: Uyakwazi ukuthola amakristu ayisimiso aphawulwa mahhala lomsebenzi.
send_amount_below_minimum:
Isamba elilula kakhulu $amount. 
Sicela ufake isamba eliphezulu noma eliphezulu kwayo.
send_amount_below_minimum_unable:
Isamba elilula kakhulu $amount. 
Awunayo imali evumelana nalesisamba.
send_fees_deducted: Ulwazi: Imali engena kakhulu yokuthumela kwezimbalenhle imandlwe ekupheleni kwezimo okuzibandakanya. Isamba esihambisana le-imeyili esiyatholakala ku-adressi leyo imali liyaphakathi.
send_errors_cant_pay_fees: Ungaphumeleli ukulipha amanzi. $feesMissing $letter_code kulindeleke kube isuke kulo. Ngabe uzoyenza isixhumanisi noma ukuncinyana imininingwane yakho yendawo yokucubungula.
send_oops: Kukhona okuhamba kahle, sicela usazise futhi
server_add_no_wss:
Kudingekile kube ngomunye wokuvula wss://
Amathroti amanye kunalokhu akuphumeleli njengoba kuyafanele
server_add_no_wss_or_ssl:
Kudingekile kube ngomunye wokuvula wss:// noma ssl://
Amathroti amanye kunalokhu akuphumeleli njengoba kuyafanele
server_add_server_wrong_genesis:
Ihashi le-Genesis alingane.
Le server alenzile ukufaneleka kwalo kuhlelo.
server_settings_alert_hardcoded_content: Amasivamile kamadivayisi abukhombisiwe, kuyakwenza futhi kuhlulekile.
server_settings_error_no_server_left: Kudingekile kube lula ikheli elingenacanyulwe ukuphambili!
setup_continue_alert_content:
Qinisekisa ukuthi uqinisile ukugcina isithombe sakho sokuseed. 
Ungayifumana ngemuva kwezilungiso zesicelo sakho.
setup_import_note: Sicela ufake i-seed oyifunayo ukufaka. Lokhu akungakwazi ukubukwa kulo nge-i-private key.
setup_pin: Sicela ufake i-PIN ngaphambi kokuphambuka kwakho.
setup_price_feed_description: Lokhu kuzovumela i-balance yakho yewaleti ukubonwa ngesikhathi sokukhokhelwa kwezimali kwesikhathi semarketing.
setup_bg_sync_description: Lokhu kuzovumela amapulani e-background wezilinganiso zakho.
setup_securebox_fail:
Siyaxolisa kakhulu.
Idivayisi yakho ayitholi ukufaneleka kokuthuthukiswa kwezichumimbi.
setup_text1: Uma ubeqhubekile udlulisile izitolo zakho futhi ubeqotho lwakho, yetha
setup_save_text1: Uhlelo olufaneleka lwezincwadi ezisegqibeleleyo ezithi i-Seed. Kungukhombisa uphawu olubalulekile oluzokunika usayizi oluphelelwe futhi kulo konke okokusebenzisweni komsebenzi wakho nemali yakho yonke.
tx_rejected: Izitayela zithathwe yilokishini. Sicela uzame futhi.
tx_retry_snack: Ukuvusa kwethumela kuhambiswe. Uma kunguqibile, izitayela zizoba nenkambu embi.
wallet_receive_label_hint: Ukucindezela umgqomo okuvulekile kuyatholakala i-labeli le-adressi.
wallet_receive_label_hint_privacy: Ukuguquka komgqomo wakho kuqalile kakhulu ngokwenyathi. Uma ufuna ukuguqushwa le-adressi, kudingeka uthinte ukuthi "e-wathshiwe" kumibhalo yendawo ehamba phambili lapho uliyisebenzisa.
wallet_send_label_hint_metadata: Izimbalenhle ziyabalwa kodwa ezokwaziwa yikona ezindaweni ezilandelayo.
wallet_scan_notice_bg_notifications: Ukuvumela amapulani e-background ku-Izilungiso Zesicelo kuyakwazisa kakhulu ukucubungula okumelwe.
secure_storage_body:
Ukufunda kwezithombe ezivulekile kuhambiswe. 
Sicela ususe i-data le-App kanye ne-cache yale-App kulesi sihloko.
wallet_value_alert_content:
Ukuthuthukiswa kwenkinga elilula kakhulu ngozimali ku-waleti wethu. 
Khombisa izimali zakho kwaStakebox, iwaleti yemali yeLedger noma iwaleti yemali encane.
store_description:
Thumela futhi wamukele i-Peercoin, umqali we-Proof-of-Stake, efonini yakho.

Gcina imbewu yakho yesikhwama ivikelekile.
Lolu hlelo lokusebenza luza newaranti nhlobo.
Sebenzisa ngokuzifaka engozini.

Izici:
- Ngokusekelwe ku-electrum protocol.
- Thumela futhi wamukele peercoin.
- Ilungele ukuhwebelana ngemuva kokufakwa (akukho ukulinda).
- Peercoin kanye Peercoin testnet wallets.
- Ukuphathwa kwebhuku lamakheli.
- Ngenisa izikhwama zephepha.
- Ngenisa futhi uthumele okhiye bangasese (WIF).
- Ukuphathwa kweseva.
- Ukusekelwa kwezilimi eziningi.
- Izaziso zangemuva.

Imikhawulo eyaziwayo ingatholakala endaweni yokugcina ye-Github.
store_short: I-waleti yakho yedivayisi ye-Peercoin kanye nesi-testnet ye-Peercoin.
sign_step_3_description: Lomuva wakho we-Signature. Ungathinta emihlanganweni uma ufuna ukuyigcina kulokhu.
sign_reset_alert_body: Lokhu kuzokushintsha konke okukhethiwe kanye ne-Signature sakho kuzoba kucishwe.
setup_legal_switch_tile: Ngiqondile kanye ngiqalela ukuthi mina kuphinde kube ngumhlambi wemali yami. Akukho muntu ongatholakaliyo ukungisiza ukuyilandela ngenkathi ungidliselisa amacala ami. Okokuqala ama-developer awebhusayithi akaphindekezi isivumelo sobumfihlo. Ngiyoyisebenzisa le app ngemigomo yami. Ngiyafunda ngokuhlaziya umthetho phezulu.
setup_auth_subtitle_plural: Ukuphephuka kweseshini kuyokuphephuka ngesikhathi sokuphindaphindapha $days izinsuku.
setup_auth_subtitle_singular: Ukuphephuka kweseshini kuyokuphephuka ngesikhathi sokuphindaphindapha usuku olusha $days.
setup_auth_hint: Kudingeka ufake iseedi sakho emuva kokuphephuka kweseshini.
app_settings_delete_description: Ngakho-ke uma akufakile i-akhawunti ebhalwelela le-app, akukho okusemthethweni yokususa. Uveze iseedi sakho, olungenacala lweentengo, okuyilipho elikhethekileyo. Lesi sicelo silothile, yilokho obeka isichumiso sakho kanye ne-sicelo sokukhokha ukwenyathi ezilula. Le app ikuthanda ekukhomba ulwazi lwakho futhi iyakhona ngokwenzekile.
